title: Noctes ambrosianæ,

snippet: *Tho Meadows lie south of Heriot's and George Watson's Hospital's, in Edinburgh, with Brantsfield Links, extend to about 200 acres, which are open for the recreation of inhabitants, by virtue of royal jrrants to the city.

title: Tweed and Don; or, Recollections and reflections of an angler for the last fifty years ...
